title: Saltwater Organics
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Organic, Western, Salad bar, Juice bar, Take-out
description: Health food cafe and shop. Cafe offers a range of options, including a salad bar and juice bar. Choose from almond, soy, rice or oat milk for coffee. Shop sells eco-friendly, organic and fair trade products such as hair/body products, baby items, mineral makeup, and skin care; also a range of tea, coffee, nuts, seeds, dried fruits and gluten free products, as well as vitamins, homeopathy, eco-friendly gifts.
